  • WFDS module
  • View page source

WFDS moduleÂ¶

The wfds module is for configuring and running the Wildland-urban interface Fire Dynamics Simulator (WFDS). The WFDS``class is used to setup the run. This class inherits the ``Mesh class, so meshes can be dealt with there. The main purpose of the WFDS class is to create a WFDS input file. The Execute class runs a WFDS simulation. The GenerateBinaryGrid class is used to generate grids for the capsis module.

See the FDS Users Guide: https://pages.nist.gov/fds-smv/manuals.html and the WFDS Users Guide: https://www.fs.fed.us/pnw/fera/wfds/wfds_user_guide.pdf for further information.
